data.title: 830 economists sign appeal against political interference in BOT
data.description: Four ex-governors in the group calling for caution in appointing the board chairman on Monday

data.title: Digital assets continue to offer high growth potential in long run
data.description: The global cryptocurrency market has grown 68 per cent year-to-date and would grow further in the next 3-5 years, Cryptomind CEO Sanjay Popli said on Saturday.

data.title: Tourism industry rebound fuels investment in Thailand's hotel sector
data.description: New hotels strategically located in popular tourist destinations such as Phuket, Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Samui

data.title: Bangkok Bank ready to support Thai businesses venturing into India
data.description: Bangkok Bank has identified India as a promising market for Thai businesses, offering significant growth opportunities, bank president Chartsiri Sophonpanich said.

data.title: TMBThanachart reported a net profit of THB 5.23 billion in Q3 2024
data.description: The Bank prioritizes customer support by aligning with household debt resolution and responsible lending. It has also launched the “Tang-Lak program” to assist customers affected by floods, demonstrating its commitment to helping those in need.

data.title: Ultra-luxury houses boom amid slumping property market
data.description: Residences valued at more than 100 million baht being snapped up in Bangkok hotspots

data.title: Property developers beg central bank to modify loan-to-value ratio
data.description: Fears grow that the slumping property market will severely affect building contractors and construction material suppliers

data.title: House and Condo Show generates over 6 billion baht in bookings
data.description: The four-day House and Condo Show drew bookings worth over 6 billion baht with total purchases expected to exceed 10 billion baht, exhibition organisers said on Tuesday.

data.title: Vayupak Fund One debuts its Type A investment units on SET
data.description: ‘VAYU1’ debuts with opening price of 10.10 baht, a 0.10-baht increase from initial offering price

data.title: Thai Bankers’ Association proposes measures to deal with NPLs
data.description: Interest suspension, debt restrictions to help individuals and SMEs avoid foreclosures

data.title: Finance Ministry eyes new projects to stimulate property market
data.description: Ministry eyes 55 billion baht to fund special loans for low-income persons wanting to buy or build new homes, or repair their existing property

data.title: KBank posts 38 billion baht profit for 9 months, up 15.4% YoY
data.description: Kattiya Indaravijaya, Chief Executive Officer of Kasikornbank, noted that Thailand’s economy showed uneven recovery in the third quarter of 2024.

data.title: Property Perfect sells Hyatt Regency Sukhumvit Hotel
data.description: Property Perfect Pcl, a leading real-estate developer in Thailand, has announced the sale of the Hyatt Regency Sukhumvit Hotel for 5.055 billion baht.

data.title: Seven major Thai banks report record-breaking revenues
data.description: Seven major Thai banks listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) have reported record-breaking revenues, with Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) leading the pack with a dividend payout of 9.84 baht.

data.title: Govt settles over 21,000 loan shark cases worth over 1 billion baht
data.description: Finance Ministry has also persuaded many non-banking creditors to register as pico-finance firms

data.title: How to use cute characters to win over customers and boost business
data.description: The much-loved “Butterbear” mascot of Coffee Beans by Dao and the baby pygmy hippopotamus, “Moo Deng” (bouncy pig) are good examples of emotional strategies to access business opportunities.

data.title: Krungsri reports a 7% decline in 9-month profit, standing at 23 billion baht
data.description: Krungsri (Bank of Ayudhya PCL and its subsidiaries) reported a net profit of 23.42 billion baht for the first nine months of 2024, reflecting a 7.0% decline compared to the same period in 2023.

data.title: CIMB Thai posts a 9-month profit of 1.8 billion baht, up nearly 9%.
data.description: CIMB Thai Bank PCL (CIMB Thai) reported its unreviewed consolidated financial results for the nine months ending 30 September 2024.

data.title: Srettha’s adviser Kittiratt rumored to take over as BOT board chairman
data.description: Appointment of ex-finance minister seen as attempt to pressure central bank on monetary policies

data.title: Sea Group files application to set up virtual bank
data.description: Singapore’s tech giant, whose partners include Bangkok Bank and Sahapat, confident it can improve life for the unserved and underserved

data.title: Real estate experts warn of continued crisis, seek government support
data.description: Real estate experts have warned that the sector remains in crisis as we enter the final quarter of the year, citing high mortgage rejection rates and plummeting sales while urging the government to extend supportive measures to bolster the market.

data.title: Thai virtual bank licence deadline passes with 5 initial applicants
data.description: The Bank of Thailand has closed applications for three virtual bank licences, with the final number of contenders remaining at five

data.title: Government urged to increase support for ailing property sector
data.description: Leading economists have called for increased government support for Thailand’s property sector, warning of a prolonged slowdown and its potential negative impact on the broader economy.

data.title: Thailand tops demand for gold in ASEAN  for 2nd successive quarter
data.description: Growth in consumer gold demand was the highest in Thailand among ASEAN countries for the second consecutive quarter, with an 11% year-on-year (YoY) increase.

data.title: RML bets on ultra-luxury Bangkok mansions amid property slump
data.description: Despite concerns over Thailand's sluggish real estate market, a niche opportunity in the high-net-worth segment has prompted leading developers to launch branded residences and luxury projects.

data.title: Expats’ demand for luxury condos jumps 8%: CBRE
data.description: Wealthy foreigners, mainly Chinese and Taiwanese, think nothing of shelling out 350,000 baht/sqm for a condo

data.title: Silverlake Axis, Lao Bullion Bank partner to boost gold reserves, stability
data.description: Silverlake Axis, a leading banking and financial technology company, has announced its partnership with Lao Bullion Bank. The partnership was commenced in a signing ceremony on Friday, 13 September 2024.

data.title: SET jumps to 1,431 points since Paetongtarn named premier
data.description: The Thai stock market surge reflects increased investor confidence in the new government, as analysts attribute this to expected policy announcements and stability

data.title: AssetWise targets foreign buyers with luxury condo projects in Phuket
data.description: Property developer AssetWise (ASW) has launched four new luxury condominium projects in Phuket province, aimed at international buyers and investors amid rising demand for second homes in the popular resort destination.

data.title: Business titans share insights at Krungsri Forum 2024
data.description: Strategic applications of artificial intelligence (AI) are essential for businesses across all sectors to remain competitive in the current landscape characterised by uncertainties and vulnerabilities, according to Thailand's business leaders.

data.title: Thai businesses call for urgent measures to curb strengthening baht
data.description: The private sector is urging the government to take immediate action, warning a stronger baht can cost the economy up to 130 billion baht in lost export earnings

data.title: One Bangkok officially opens with a spectacular celebration
data.description: One Bangkok, a world-class landmark aspiring to be "The Heart of Bangkok", officially opened on Friday with a grand celebration themed "Let Our Hearts Beat as One".

data.title: Online Thai products seller TOPTHAI set for deeper foray into Middle East
data.description: Alliance with UAE e-commerce platform expected to boost demand

data.title: Finance Ministry urges ‘suitable’ policy rate
data.description: Bank of Thailand asked to adopt policies that will boost economic growth and maintain 1-3% inflation
